The card index continues to be maintained in working condition. Since 2004, it has been designated as a protected cultural monument.
The length of the wall is 52 meters, the width is 6 meters, and the height is 8 meters. It is serviced by eighteen mobile working platforms.
The card index contains 9000 boxes (each 3 meters long) and accommodates a total of 135 million documents related to pensions and social benefits for residents.
